PackageOracle.name: DA_LOC_LOCATOR
PackageOracle.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE CHTR.DA_LOC_LOCATOR
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.39.59.766335000 PM -06:00 */
AS

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,loc_id IN NUMBER
,locator_id IN NUMBER
,locator_usage_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,loc_locator_start_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,loc_locator_end_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,loc_id IN NUMBER
,locator_id IN NUMBER
,locator_usage_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,loc_locator_start_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

END da_loc_locator;

body.name: DA_LOC_LOCATOR
body.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE BODY CHTR.DA_LOC_LOCATOR
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.39.59.776756000 PM -06:00 */
AS

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,loc_id IN NUMBER
,locator_id IN NUMBER
,locator_usage_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,loc_locator_start_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,loc_locator_end_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_loc_locator.add, parms=' || loc_id || '|' || locator_id || '|' || locator_usage_type_cd || '|' || loc_locator_start_dttm || '|' || loc_locator_end_dttm || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_loc_locator a
(
a.loc_id
,a.locator_id
,a.locator_usage_type_cd
,a.loc_locator_start_dttm
,a.loc_locator_end_dttm
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
add.loc_id
,add.locator_id
,add.locator_usage_type_cd
,add.loc_locator_start_dttm
,add.loc_locator_end_dttm
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
);
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_loc_locator.add');

END add;

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,loc_id IN NUMBER
,locator_id IN NUMBER
,locator_usage_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,loc_locator_start_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_loc_locator.del, parms=' || loc_id || '|' || locator_id || '|' || locator_usage_type_cd || '|' || loc_locator_start_dttm || '|' || audit_user || '|');
UPDATE chtr.t_loc_locator a
SET a.record_stat = 'D'
,a.modified_dttm = SYSTIMESTAMP
,a.modified_by = del.audit_user
WHERE a.loc_id = del.loc_id
AND a.locator_id = del.locator_id
AND a.locator_usage_type_cd = del.locator_usage_type_cd
AND a.loc_locator_start_dttm = del.loc_locator_start_dttm
;
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_loc_locator.del');

END del;

END da_loc_locator;
